wikipedia_page.main: Pery Burge (1955 – 10 February 2013) was an English artist who, during the 2000s, worked with abstract images using ink in water or ink on paper, invoking natural processes such as surface tension driven flow, gravity, turbulence, rotation and erosion.

response: April 2012, Tullio DeSantis and Pery Burge have collaborated on multimedia projects that involved narrative readings, music by Tullio and visual fluid imagery created by Pery Burge.Tullio and Pery Burge  Retrieved April 29, 2012"Artist in Residence", Pery Burge  Retrieved June 8, 2012
